== Possible Meeting Locations ==
This page is a listing of locations that the Chicago Loco might be able to use for future meetings and events. If you know of a location that would be able and willing to host us, please feel free to add it to the list below.

=== Elmhurst Public Library ===
* Address:  125 S. Prospect Avenue - Elmhurst, IL 60126
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost: Free
* Notes:

=== IIT Institute of Design ===
* Address:  350 N. LaSalle Ave Floor 2 or 6
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost:  Free
* Notes: Need specialKevin to open up, Can't conflict with school event in rooms

=== College of DuPage ===
* Address: 425 Fawell Blvd. - Glen Ellyn, IL 60137
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost:  Free
* Notes: 2 weeks notice should be fine on reserving space, but more notice is better.

=== Goose Island Brew Pub ===
* Address:  Needed
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost:  Food & Drink costs
* Notes:

=== IIT Campus ===
* Address: Illinois Institute of Technology, Rice Campus, Wheaton, IL, 60187-8488
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost:  ??
* Notes:

=== onShore Networks ===
* Address: 1407 W Chicago Ave., Chicago, IL 60642
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost: Free
* Notes: Micah Gersten (micahg) must be present for duration of meeting.  Micah is available Sun-Thurs night from 6PM on. Table in Conference Room holds 12-14 people.  Can squeeze in another 6 or so chairs along the walls.

=== Schaumburg Public Library ===
* Address: 130 S. Roselle Road, Schaumburg, IL 60193
* Free Wifi:  Yes
* Cost:  Free
* Notes:  A STDL card holder must reserve the room.

=== Pumping Station One ===
* Address: 3354 N. Elston Ave, Chicago, IL 60618

=== De Paul University ===
* Address 1: 2250 N. Sheffield, Chicago, IL 60614 (Lincoln Park)
* Address 2: 1 E. Jackson, Chicago, IL 60604 (Loop)
* Free Wifi: Only for Draycen De Cator (see notes)
* Cost: Free
* Notes: Draycen De Cator (ddecator) is able to reserve rooms at either of De Paul's campuses. Projectors will be either included or can be easily reserved. Unfortunately, De Paul only allows students on the Wifi network, so Draycen is the only one who will be able to access the internet. Room requests need to be sent in at least 5 days ahead of the event. If you want to hold an event at De Paul, please email Draycen at ddecator@gmail.com to setup the details
